author: fmanteca
body:
#### PR description:

Update HMT **loose** shower thresholds to values corresponding to 2023 data taking, needed for 2023 run preparation.

Thresholds were proposed in [1].

#### PR validation:

[1]. https://indico.cern.ch/event/1225553/contributions/5155482/attachments/2555644/4411167/221128_L1DPG.pdf
title: Update HMT shower thresholds for Loose HMT emulation in CSC
